philosophy: 옷을 입는 필드는 모두 디자인의 대상이다
디자인, 실용성, 기술 세 가지 요소를 하나로 융합한다

camera.angle_preference: environmental wide showing context, or tight mid-shot for gear detail

pose.weight: stable wide stance or casual lean against structure
signature_poses: leaning against industrial concrete wall, one knee bent, checking gear casually
sitting on car hood/trunk with legs dangling, looking into distance
standing at structure edge with wide stance, hands in pockets, wind in jacket
crouching to adjust boot/zipper, showing layering system detail
walking through urban environment, mid-stride, natural movement captured
group composition: models at different heights/positions around structure or vehicle
forbidden_poses: catalog standing with arms at sides

expression.gaze: focused on middle distance or technical detail
expression.vibe: modern explorer who is quietly competent
expression.attitude: I am prepared for anything but not showing off about it
signature_expressions: calm focused gaze into middle distance, as if assessing terrain
slight squint with sunglasses pushed up, technical concentration
relaxed but alert expression, the look of someone comfortable in any environment
looking down at gear/detail with quiet satisfaction

lighting.color_temp: cool blue hour or neutral daylight
lighting.shadow: soft for 3D texture emphasis on technical fabrics
